class.name: CATIUdfFactory
class.abstract: Interface to create a User Feature reference or a Power Copy reference.

method.name: CreateDocumentTemplate
method.abstract: Creates a document template feature.

method.name: CreatePowerCopy
method.abstract: Creates a Power Copy reference.

method.name: CreateUserFeature
method.abstract: Creates a User Feature reference.

method.name: GetDocumentTemplateList
method.abstract: Retrieves all Document Templates references.

method.name: GetFeatureSet
method.abstract: Retrieves the feature set.

method.name: GetPowerCopyList
method.abstract: Retrieves all Power Copy references.

method.name: GetUserFeatureList
method.abstract: Retrieves all User Feature references.

class.name: CATIUdfFeature
class.abstract: Interface to define a User Feature or a Power Copy reference.

method.name: AddComponents
method.abstract: Update the list of components with the user selection.

method.name: AddParameter
method.abstract: Publishes a parameter.

method.name: GetInput
method.abstract: Retrieves one input.

method.name: GetInputRole
method.abstract: Retrieves the role of one input.

method.name: GetInputsNumber
method.abstract: Retrieves inputs count.

method.name: GetInternalParameters
method.abstract: Retrieves all available parameters.

method.name: GetListInputs
method.abstract: Retrieves all inputs and their role.

method.name: GetParameterRole
method.abstract: Retrieves the role of one published parameter.

method.name: GetParameters
method.abstract: Retrieves all published parameters.

method.name: GetPreview
method.abstract: Retrieves the associated pixel image as preview.

method.name: GetReferenceComponents
method.abstract: Retrieves all referenced components.

method.name: RemoveParameter
method.abstract: Un-Publishes a parameter.

method.name: SetComponents
method.abstract: Sets a list of components.

method.name: SetInputRole
method.abstract: Modifies the role of one input.

method.name: SetParameterRole
method.abstract: Modifies the role of one published parameter.

method.name: SetPreview
method.abstract: Sets a pixel image as preview.

method.name: VerifyComponents
method.abstract: Checks the validity of a list of components.

class.name: CATIUdfFeatureInstance
class.abstract: Interface to edit a User Feature instance.

method.name: FilterInput
method.abstract: Filters the selection.

method.name: FilterInput
method.abstract: Filters the selection.

method.name: GetInput
method.abstract: Retrieves one input.

method.name: GetInput
method.abstract: Retrieves one input.

method.name: GetInputRole
method.abstract: Retrieves the role of one input.

method.name: GetInputsNumber
method.abstract: Retrieves the input count.

method.name: GetOutput
method.abstract: Retrieves one output.

method.name: GetOutput
method.abstract: Retrieves one output.

method.name: GetOutputsNumber
method.abstract: Retrieves the output count.

method.name: GetParameter
method.abstract: Retrieves a published parameter from its role.

method.name: GetParameterRole
method.abstract: Retrieves the role of a published parameter.

method.name: GetParameters
method.abstract: Retrieves all published parameters.

method.name: GetSourceInput
method.abstract: Retrieves the source input.

method.name: Init
method.abstract: Initializes the modification transaction.

method.name: Reset
method.abstract: Ends the modification transaction.

method.name: SetNewInput
method.abstract: Changes one input.

method.name: SetNewInput
method.abstract: Changes one input.

class.name: CATIUdfFeatureSet
class.abstract: Interface to handle the set of User Feature reference or of Power Copy.

method.name: AppendFeature
method.abstract: Add a new feature into the set.

method.name: GetListFeature
method.abstract: Reads list of feature included in the set.

method.name: GetType
method.abstract: Reads the type of this set.

class.name: CATIUdfFeatureUser
class.abstract: Interface which enables advanced edition for UserFeature reference.

method.name: AddOutput
method.abstract: Creates a new external output.

method.name: GetOutputRole
method.abstract: Retrieves the role of an output.

method.name: GetOutputs
method.abstract: Retrieves the list of outputs.

method.name: GetPossibleOutputs
method.abstract: Retrieves the list of possible outputs.

method.name: GetType
method.abstract: Gets the type of the user feature.

method.name: RemoveOutput
method.abstract: Removes an external output.

method.name: ReplaceOutput
method.abstract: Replaces the result of an output.

method.name: SetOutputRole
method.abstract:
Sets the role of an output
Role: The role is the name of the output in the tree The role of the User Feature can not be modified.

method.name: SetType
method.abstract: Sets the type of the user feature.

class.name: CATIUdfInstantiate
class.abstract: Interface to instantiate a template reference.

method.name: EndInstantiate
method.abstract: Ends the instantiation process.

method.name: FilterInput
method.abstract: Filters the selection for the valuation of one input of the instance.

method.name: GetDefaultDestinationOfInsertion
method.abstract: Retrieves the default destination path and its relative position.

method.name: GetDisplayName
method.abstract: Retrieves the name of the reference template.

method.name: GetFilterInputMessage
method.abstract: Gets an information message explaining the FilterInput failure.

method.name: GetInstantiated
method.abstract: Retrieves the instantiated feature.

method.name: GetNewInput
method.abstract: Retrieves one input of the instance.

method.name: GetNewInputPathElement
method.abstract: Retrieves the path of one input of the instance.

method.name: GetOldInput
method.abstract: Retrieves one input of the reference template.

method.name: GetOldInputs
method.abstract: Retrieves the list of all the inputs of the reference along with their role.

method.name: GetParameters
method.abstract: Retrieves the list of all published parameters along with their role.

method.name: Instantiate
method.abstract: Validates the instantiation.

method.name: Reset
method.abstract: This method has to be called at the end of the instantiation.

method.name: SetDestinationPath
method.abstract: Sets the destination path for the instantiation.

method.name: SetDestinationPathOfInsertion
method.abstract: Sets the destination path and position for the instantiation.

method.name: SetDisplayName
method.abstract: Sets the name of the instantiated feature.

method.name: SetNewInput
method.abstract: Sets one input of the instance at a given position.

method.name: UseIdenticalName
method.abstract: Valuates automatically all the inputs of the instance.
